title: One year Merlin family pass included in incredible Wowcher Mystery Kids Deal
text:

Wowcher has launched a special £20 Mystery Kids Deal , which could see shoppers bag a one-year Merlin family pass, worth £137.

There are two Merlin Annual Passes for a family of four up for grabs, but the catch is that prizes for every voucher are chosen at random.

The handy pass gives unlimited access to over 32 top attractions across the UK, including Alton Towers, The London Eye and Legoland Windsor.

The massive saving on the normal annual price of the Merlin Pass makes this well worth buying up.

(Image: Bloomberg)

Other prizes available in the deal include Nintendo Switch bundles and a range of top branded toys from Disney, Marvel and more.

The £20 premium option of the offer is available for customers to claim from now until 3 November, while stocks last.

However, like Wowcher's recent Christmas Markets Mystery holiday deal , the new offer is selling like hot cakes online so we doubt it'll be around for long.

How to claim the Mystery Kids Deal

Shoppers who wish to claim just need to head to Wowcher to purchase a voucher .

Once purchased Wowcher will send you a unique code.

Then customers will need to head to the redemption page using the supplied link and enter delivery details.

What's included in the Merlin Pass?

One full year's access to Merlin attractions in 2020 for a family of four.

Which attractions are included?

Alton Towers Resort, Chessington World of Adventures Resort, LEGOLAND Windsor Resort, Thorpe Park Resort, London Eye, Madame Tussauds London, London Dungeon, Shrek's Adventure! and SEALIFE London.

Check out the full list online at merlinannualpass.co.uk .
description: Wowcher are giving away Merlin Annual passes worth £137 for £20 as part of a new mystery deal for kids
